tagline: For people who insist on the truth
body:

## Welcome to Ppinion!
Insist on the TRUTH

## Support or Contact
For all issues regarding Ppinion, please contact Paul Makhija on his home number at any time--day or night. Or simply show up at his front door. Be sure to insist that he provide you with a snack while he imvestigates your issue.
